name: Last Escort
description:
A tower defense like made by Middlle and me for Unreal engine Spring jam.

Playable with mouse only.

Escort the "train" and build turret around it to protect you from the swarm coming out from the melting ice.

Music provided by No Copyright Music:
https://www.youtube.com/c/royaltyfree...

Music used: Human Planet by Ender Güney
https://www.youtube.com/c/NCMEpicMusic
